snippet.title: SHIFT 3 Walkthrough (Both Endings)
snippet.description:
This is a walkthrough of the game "SHIFT 3".

Play the game here: https://armorgames.com/play/1846/shift-3

You can visit my Patreon page if you want or something:
https://www.patreon.com/awalkthroughlife

Game created by:
The-EXP (Tony Lavelle)
Nqkoi1 (Chris Ignatov)
Music:
Furmpus (by DanPaladin) - https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/8183
Genesis(loop) (by sorohanro) - https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/55526
Dereks - Selenium Rox (by Dereks) - (the link no longer works) https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/84914
___________
Game description (from creator):
You asked for it, you got it. SHIFT 3 is here, and it's unlike any Shifting experience you've had before. A massive Adventure mode takes you to the roots of the SHIFT experiment, tonnes of achievements to earn and even an unlockable Celebrity secret character! And if that isn't your cup of tea, theres a selection of 18 Classic style levels from Shift players around the globe to battle your way through, and highscore boards all around! Have fun, this is SHIFT 3, and I made it just for you.

Controls
Arrow Keys - Movement
Space - Jump
Shift - SHIFT
P - Pause Menu
___________
#walkthrough #shift #shift3
